reviewText:
I love to wear jewelry. I especially love wearing rings, and I wear them all the time. I have a ring on every finger. So does my daughter. That is why, when I had the chance to review the daughter's ring by TZARO, I jumped at the chance. This is a ring that she will wear forever.  The ring looks exactly like it shows in the picture.  The engraving is just as it appears in the picture. I ordered a size 6 ring, expecting it to be a little loose. Thankfully, it fits perfectly. In fact it fits better than her graduation ring does. I am going to save it until she finishes college. She graduates in May.  The only reason that I have the ring, on my finger, is to review it. I don't want to take it off! I definitely am going to buy another one for someone I consider my mother. This ring is made of a sturdy metal that is silver plated, so it will not turn your finger green. It is hard enough to withstand dings and dents without ruining the ring. I love the hamsa pattern that is on the front of the ring. To me, it symbolizes my love for my daughter,, even though there are bumps in the road. TZARO Company has other rings for your family members. I also bought one for my two sisters. I cannot wait when I give the rings to them to see what their faces look like. I know the two of them will be extremely surprised and happy to receive them.

I received this product at a discount to allow me to test it, and then write a review based on the results of my experience using this product. I am not affiliated with this company and I never promise to provide a positive review when offered a discount. I tested the product thoroughly so that you may make an informed decision. The views expressed are 100% my own honest opinion and are in no way influenced by the discount that I received.
summary: Tell your daughter you love her.

reviewText: The product photos do not do this ring justice. It is much more adorable in person! I love how delicate and shiny it is! I am obsessed with anything hamsa, and this ring is just too cute. It will go with any outfit, and I plan on wearing it all the time. Since I bought this for myself, I wasn't too concerned with the "best daughter" engraving, but I added a photo of it if any other buyers are curious. The engraving is pretty tiny, but in my opinion very tasteful. Its kind of like a sweet surprise for any daughter receiving this as a gift. Overall, I am very happy wit the quality of this ring.

I ordered the largest size (2xx) based on other reviews. I wear a medium, 5' 2", 120lbs, 36C, 29" waist, 35" hips.  I have wide shoulders and my arms are not skinny. I figured it would be easier to take in than return for another size. It fits comfortably in the shoulders with a medium weight sweater. If I raise my arms the coat comes up but does not pull. The skirt part is very full, like a bell, and comes down to my mid calf. I like the length but kind of swim in the rest. I will wear it through a winter and decide if I like the fullness of the bottom, I can easily take out one panel behind each pocket to narrow the shape. This is a new silhouette for me and I want to have a chance to get used to it. I also took off the belt loops and allowed the belt to ride up, about 2", to my natural waist this vastly improved the fit. The coat is beautiful, just like the picture. It seems nice and warm and very light weight.
summary: buy large and make friends with a taylor

I love this top. I didn't realize there was no padding or extra support but I'm actually okay with it. I hate bathing suit shopping. HATE.

This is the most wonderful top I've ever found! I'm a 36I(US)/36G(UK) and this suit was true to size. It is EXTREMELY supportive, which reduces the neck pain from wearing a halter. It is also more "full coverage" than most. (No incidents of side boob sneaking out) The band is nice and tight, single snap closure. (I guess if you needed it tighter you could tie it instead of snapping closed.)  Wore this Memorial Weekend to the ocean and didn't have a single problem. Usually I only keep a suit on while I'm on the beach and then change immediately because the neck pain is outrageous... with this suit, I wore it all day and barely noticed. Highly recommend!
summary: A bathing suit from online that actually fits!!!

I don't usually write reviews, which probably isn't right considering how much I rely on them myself. However, this time I feel obligated because there are no other reviews, and I'd hate for someone to pass on what could quite possibly be the best thing that has ever happened to them in bikini form, all because there was no feedback.

I wear a 30F or a 32E, and every year I order a swimsuit from somewhere in the largest size with a tie-up back, just hoping I can get away with stuffing myself into it and pulling it as tight as it will go. Always, I am left looking smashed or spilling out of the top entirely and feeling disgusted with myself. I saw this and went for it because it came in my ACTUAL size.

It fits like a dream, and it is supportive. I was expecting something thicker for some reason, but it is actually very lightweight. There is no padding,  which I love, because I am trying to minimize bulk, not add to it. It doesn't make me look overtly busty and it is very flattering. I am not smashed together or oddly shaped in this top. It makes me look normal, for lack of a better word. The gold stripes are beautiful and add something really special. After struggling for years, I am very happy to have found this top!
Love it

I have to say, this jacket is pretty rad! The jacket came pretty much as shown, with some minor differences in the shape of the scorpion patch's tail and pincers and some two-toned coloring in it's stitching in what appears to be an attempt to give it some shadowing depth. Also, to my dismay, the collar is angled instead of rounded like in the photo, which adds a little too much heft to the collar for my taste.

The fitting seems pretty good. I'm a little under 6ft and weigh about 145lbs and ordered a small, I'm a thin guy and prefer a snug fit. The maneuverability is pretty good, but the sleeves are a bit short for me and the jacket pulls up exposing some midriff when I raise my hands over my head.

The jacket itself has a padded insulation and feels a bit poofy, but is comfortable once you get used to it. The padding doesn't appear to make it look poofy, but it does cause it to feel very warm. This jacket seems suitable enough to keep me warm all winter without a problem (I live in Southern Arizona), but I haven't fully tested it out in the cold yet. There are four pockets (two outside and two inside) big enough to fit a wallet or cellphone in.

One of the down sides to this jacket was that it seemed to be covered in some sort of oily substance when I received it and had a pretty bad chemical smell, like fresh dye possibly. I had to wash it three times before the smell was bearable. It recommends to get it dry cleaned, but I machine washed it on a gentle setting and it seems to be holding up just fine.

Overall a good buy for the price. I think it'd get the job done for a really good looking cosplay, and more importantly, makes for a totally radical jacket to rock for a night out on the town!

reviewText: Heading to a bear event in Florida next week and wanted a few fun, well-fitting t-shirts, so I ordered three different designs from Ajaxx63. I didn't want a dumpy potato sack cheap fitting t-shirt and was looking for a shirt with an athletic fit or tapered fit and snug fitting around the arms. Reading the bullet point descriptions on several they sounded like just what I was looking for. I ordered three different designs but the problem was that they arrived printed on three different manufacturers t-shirts of varying quality, fit and construction. The three designs I ordered were all size XL: Eagle Service Mens Service Graphic Athletic T-Shirt Size X-Large by Ajaxx63 If all three tshirts had been printed on this brand of shirt, Id already be ordering others and paying extra for overnight shipping. Just feels like a high quality shirt. Roomy in the chest with a slight taper to the waist. Nice quality heavily ribbed neck and arm bands are comfortable and snug up lightly to my very average biceps; not tight at all yet miles away from flapping in the breeze like a cheap tshirt. This was a win! Great shirt at a great price. Buy it. Bear/American Flag Ajaxx63 Men's Bear Flag Graphic Athletic T-Shirt XLarge Medium quality t-shirt. Nice fitting with a taper cut and the arms aren't flapping in the breeze. T-shirt material seems a little thinner than the shirt described above. The neck and arm bands are pretty average. I really like the picture so I hope this shirt stands up to repeated washings. Not a bad shirt at not a bad price so what the heck, go buy one. Versbro Ajaxx63 Men's Versbro Regular Fit T-Shirt X-Large Funny enough this is the most expensive t-shirt out of the three ($8.00 more) and the one that pissed me off! It is literally a HANES tagless t-shirt. Ill wash it and see if the fit improves but its got wide arms and is long enough to wear as a mini-dress (too bad I don't do drag). It feels and fits more like a t-shirt that your grandparents picked up in an airport souvenir shop on their way back from their vacation in Boca. Total disappointment on this shirt. Ajaxx63 has some great emblem designs if they had consistency in the shirts they print on, Id definitely be a repeat customer.
summary: Decent shirt at a good price.

I recently broke my cheap sunglasses so I decided to get a brand name one.  I found one that I liked and ordered it and while doing so I saw this Men's Wrap Around Black Frame Lifestyle Dark Lense Sunglasses by Sunglass Stop Shop.  They freaking looked identical in the picture but this one was 10 times cheaper so I ordered it too not really knowing what to expect.  I received it one day early and I really liked that and when I opened it I was amazed!  It looked exactly the same in person!  It seems like they were made in the same mold or something!

I ordered black polarized lenses to replace the dark bronze lenses the brand name one came with, so that added to the cost.  I thought I could swap lenses and putting the brand name lenses on the cheap one but I compared the lenses and noticed they're very slightly differently shaped, so no matter how much I tried, it just didn't fit.  Well maybe if I sand it down or something, it could fit but I don't want to do that.  Besides not being able to swap lenses, everything else is amazing.  Both are matte black, the frame feels pretty sturdy, the cheap one was lighter though, I feel a slight difference in material, the cheap one feels more plastic and the brand name feels like a blended plastic, the lenses are pretty decent although I wanted polarized lenses but maybe they'll have a polarized version later.

I showed my wife the sunglasses side by side and asked her which one is the real one and her first response was "what do you mean which one is the real one".  She couldn't tell at first glance.  The replacement lenses made the brand name one stand out but I know if the replacement lenses were able to fit in this cheap one, I know she probably could have never tell.  She kinda got mad at me for buying the expensive one lol.  Anyways, I'm very happy with this purchase and if it ever broke I would buy another one in a heart beat.  I saw other sunglasses these seller is selling with similar styles as brand name ones and I would probably get the cheap one than get the expensive one.  I just want nice looking sunglasses that protect my eyes from UV, sure it may not be polarized, but these cheap glasses does a good enough job for 10 times the price cheaper.  I only have one brand name sunglasses and I've owned a few cheap sunglasses but this by far are the best cheap sunglasses I ever bought!  I attached a picture to compare the expensive one and the cheap one and I realized I would rather buy 10 cheap ones than one at 10 times the cost.
summary: the best cheap sunglasses I ever bought!

reviewText: I love the colors in this scarf. I ordered another one.

Bohomonde, I love you. You sell the most unique, high quality scarves and pashminas. They always come wrapped like little presents with a thank you note, which makes me feel  better about my shameless scarf addiction.  ;) . This particular scarf is such a rich explosion of color - I am madly in love with it! It's Tribal and artsy, and the quality of the weave is high. The dimensions are a bit unusual for the typical scarf (it's a bit narrower), but that actually makes it more versatile - not so much fabric width to deal with what you want to knot it creatively. This will go equally well with basic black or jeans and my crazy purple suede boots!

I am a complete scarf hoarder. I believe a nice scarf can completely dress up an outfit and make it look more stylish. I also live in New England and half the year you need a nice scarf so your neck doesn't freeze or get eaten by mosquito's and no see um bugs!

I purchased this pashmina scarf because it has many of the colors that I wear every day in it. It looked very beautiful and I felt it would be a perfect scarf to take on vacation because it has so many options.

The second time I wore the scarf I had a disaster with a jar of minced garlic. I immediately put the scarf into the washing machine on the gentle cycle by itself.

After washing the scarf came out with a tighter knit and it had some pills and loose threads. It's not noticeable from far away but you can see it up close and it does make the scarf look well loved. I wish it had washed up nicer and still looked brand new. I was happy none of the colors faded at all.

I was given the opportunity to purchase this product at a discounted price of $2 for my honest and unbiased review. This does not mean, however, that I will automatically rate this as 4 or 5 stars. Each rating I give for each product I receive is always 100% honest and based solely on my own use and experiences with them. Based on my history of reviews you will see that I am not afraid to rate a product as "poor" based on a bad performance, bad quality, or even not performing as expected. Thank you!
summary: Beautiful scarf although use extremem care when washing.

reviewText:
I absolutely love this scarf!! The colors are so bright and vibrant and the texture adds so much depth. It is really hard to do this scarf justice with a picture! You can see the colors great, but it is hard to see the texture. Each chevron stripe is slightly raised giving this scarf a really good look and feel! This is the scarf I wear when I want to receive compliments. It is thicker then I expected and feels very well made. It has an elastic weave that allow it to stretch (width not length). This feels like it will last a while as long as it is taken care of. I only plan on hand washing this occasionally. It is truly lovely and I reccomend it to anyone wanting a very nice scarf!!

For reference (and I wish more reviewers did this please)... I ordered a size:  L
My measurements are: 35 x 30 x 38" (bust x waist x hips).
I'm a size 8 or 29" jeans/on bottom and a size 6 on top - 34C. I'm 5'3" and 129 lbs, slightly pear-shaped.
I am almost always a size Medium (or size L in juniors or Asian) tops, although if the top is lose fitting I can get a small sometimes.

These earrings are quite stylish, approximate 1 hoops, in black with rhinestones all around the hoop.  The rhinestones against the black background tend to be more pronounced, that is they sparkle more.

The description says clip on but these earrings are for pierced ears.  The latch is a bit tight  that is good for making sure the clasp stays fastened. But it will take a bit of effort to snap the prong into the catch or to unsnap it.
The rhinestones have a nice sparkle and some are offset just a tad, catching the light slightly at a different angle from the other rhinestones.

According to the product description, the metal is stainless steel, which means it will not rust or tarnish and it is hypoallergenic so it should not cause any problems wearing it.

The earrings come in a nice give box.  These are fashion jewelry, (at one time this was called costume jewelry) and is not to be judged or compared to the much more expensive jewelry.  For the price, these are very nice earrings.

It did arrive much much faster than the tracking stated it would.  I ordered on 11/8 and it arrived on 11/23.  It came with my regular mail in a silver waterproof pouch.  No weird smells, no oversized packaging... GREAT product and seller!  I'm definitely buying a second one!

Overall though, for $8.71, you can probably make it work. It's still really cute and does ultimately look like two separate, layered pieces.

The other reason is the clasp is hard for her to do on her own (and she likes to do everything on her own), making it harder for her to get on and off when she wants. It's easy to wash and keep clean though and overall a great product. My recommendation would be to make it a bit longer in order to slide over a child's head without using the clasp. The color is great. This shipping was awesome. The goldtone is nice and even. It is not too heavy nor is it so light that it feels plastic or cheap. My one complaint is that this is linked together in pieces and they are spaced so closely together that it does not have easy movement. Often it will catch and the necklace will not lay flat, two or more sections of the necklace will lean up against the next section and not lay flat or smooth against your neck. So it can be uncomfortable to wear. I don't think I would have purchased this had I known this, but since I have it I will wear it when I need this particular color. I won't be often though. So I am not whole heartedly giving my recommendation for this necklace but it will do in a pinch if you need this color. I posted some photos. The first it how it will stand up and lean on another section. The second photo is of the back and the links. The third is of the necklace and how it looks when it lays flat. I hope this helps!

reviewText: not happy with product

This has become my second favorite piece to pearls. Against a black or white blouse, this is a striking piece.  The picture does not do it justice.

I and extremely sensitive to metals and most costume jewelry but I was curious about this piece.  The low cost made it seem like a low risk purchase, so I went ahead and ordered. Glad I did!  I was happy to find that this does not irritate me after wearing a portion of the day.  The necklace also does not cause discolorations.  I can't speak about the earrings if wearing them all day.  My ears are SUPER sensitive, so I don't chance it.  I have only worn them for an hour and take them off. What I can say about the earrings, is that they did not cause the 'tingle' I usually feel with other costume jewelry.

As an alternative, I usually pair the necklace with real 14K gold earrings and sterling silver.  The gold is a nice tone that is probably closer to 10K gold than 14K, but it is still nice.  It is heavy enough to be durable, but light enough to not notice it all day.

It goes well to dress up a t-shirt and jeans and my semi-formal wear/business attire.

My advice; get the mesh bracelet to complete the look.
summary: Flexible Piece- Get the Bracelet to Complete the Look

The shirt is perfect for what I wanted. It has that pinup feel while still looking modern. The shirt is beautifully constructed out of a thick, yet stretchy red shirting. I took off one star for the sleeve length and the main zipper, the nearby fabric really wants to crawl up and get stuck. I would advise others to starch and iron the fabric next to the zipper before wearing.

Addendum to original review:  Though I am a male, this jacket zips on the left so it is a women's.  I liked the fit however and kept it anyway.  Secondly, the first jacket arrived without the red lining which was pictured, but it did have leather zipper pulls which weren't pictured but added alot to the look of the jacket.  I wanted the rock n roll look of red lining so I sent the jacket back (it, too, zipped on the left, but fit well).  When I received the replacement, it zipped on the left, had a red lining, but no leather zipper pulls.  I contacted the seller and asked if they could send me the pulls.  I offered to pay.  They said they would try but that they had no control over the making of the jackets! Then they said if I wrote a positive review they would send leather pulls.  After several emails I sit here with no zipper pulls and a jacket that zips on the left, a women's jacket.

reviewText:
I live in the Chicagoland area and bought this jacket for extreme cold.  It is great for low temperatures and wind.  I have worn it in negative 20 degree temps and felt comfortable.  It comes to about mid-thigh on me so the area between my boots and the jacket tends to get cold.  The hood does a pretty good job of keeping the cold and wind away.  It has a draw string so you can close it tight around your face but I have not used it yet.
It is somewhat bulky but what do you expect when you want something to keep you warm in that low of temps.  Pockets are fairly handy.

I would not recommend this jacket for winter sports as it is a little bulky and would restrict your movement.  I would not recommend for warmer climates as this jacket would be too much for mild winters.

I was very unhappy with this t-shirt and the company.  I ordered larger than my normal size (as suggested) because the shirt runs small but I still was forced to exchange it because it was VERY small.  Then, after the second wash, it fell apart.  Pieces of glitter fell off the shirt all over my washer and my other clothing.  I was very careful to follow the wash instructions, which say to wash in cold water and tumble try on low.  When I contacted the company for a refund or exchange, they only offered me half of what I spend because it was past the 30-day refund policy.  They also insulted me by saying, "This is a handmade item, so it does need to be taken care of more carefully.  We recommend hang drying this shirt."  Obviously I figured that out AFTER I had carefully followed THEIR instructions!  The shirt is adorable, which is why I picked it, but not worth the hassle, the money, or the insulting e-mail.
summary: We recommend hang drying this shirt

reviewText:
I ordered/received the black framed, rainbow lens sunglasses. I generally like heart shaped sunglasses, and own a couple of pairs of them already. These are fairly cheap price-wise, so I wasn't expecting something super high quality or amazing, but what I got wasn't like the pictures by almost any means.
The rainbow lens effect is weak, to put it mildly. It's barely notable in anything but the most intense lighting- very pale and de-saturated otherwise; there's not often reflective quality like in the pictures shown.
They are slightly smaller than most heart shaped sunglasses, though not tiny. They may fit too tightly on those with wider or larger heads.
Also, when looking at them in good light/ closely, there are a a couple of [not bad] scratches on the lens itself, and a couple of ugly roughed up places on the frames. -It didn't seem like it was a shipping issue, as the sunglasses came covered in a plastic bag. This makes me think they were finished sloppily.

On the positive side of things: the heart-shape itself is a pretty good one, and it came generally unbroken [so It seems like ok structure quality] with a decent, small sunglasses bag.

Definitely a loser in the sense that what you see isn't what you get. I'm definitely disappointed.
summary: Don't buy based on the images~

reviewText: I really liked this shirt when I first got it (in gray).  Nice fit, nice fabric, good color selection.  I bought two more at a Beall's store near us.  Then we washed the shirt.  IT SHRANK TWO SIZES!  I've never seen anything like it.  Machine washed in cold water (as the label suggests), taken out of the dryer when still WET (not just damp) and air dried (the washing instructions say you can tumble dry on low).  The Amazon description says these shirts are 100% Rayon but they are not.  The label on the shirts says they are 73% Rayon and 37% polyester (I don't know if that matters to the shrinking issue).  I laid the blue Windham Pointe shirt I've worn and washed twice down on top of the teal Windham Pointe shirt I've never worn or washed.  Both shirts are XL.  The blue shirt is obviously much smaller now.  In length the blue shirt has shrunk almost SEVEN INCHES!  Both of the Windham Pointe shirts I've worn and washed have shrunk this much.
Material smell funky and it is just weird

The item came way before it was expected which is nice. It feels nice and does not look cheaply made. I wear about a size 6 - 7 and typically sized medium clothes. After reading the reviews I selected size large for this coat, went back and on better judgement selected size XXL. I have a slightly athletic build & my arms tend to be the problem area with most tops, where things fit fine, possibly a little loose every where else except my arms, that is where most things are really tight, to the point I can't raise my hands without worrying if I'm going to rip she-hulk style myself out of whatever I'm wearing. Even ordering the XXL (mind you I wear a size medium 6-7) it is so small on the top, I can't even close the latch around the bust area. I also can't raise my  arms higher than a foot without feeling the coat straining. The tag says size XXL is equal to size 12 in US standards. There is no way that is accurate. The largest size I can wear comfortably is size 8, this (supposed) size 12 is too small from rib cage up. I would recommend this coat to small framed people, it really is a beautiful coat, fairly well made. But if you're anything beyond a size 7, athletic, busty, eat food at all, are built like a normal human female, I hate to break it to you, this is not going to fit the way you want it too. I am planning on taking it altered to fit better around the bust/shoulder/arm area, as much as I adore this coat, there is no way I can wear it the way it's made.

reviewText: So I had to have this coat despite everyone's bad reviews and I must say that it's very important that you follow all the advice and get a larger size. In fact a much larger size. I typically wear medium to large tops in junior and small to medium in women's. I have a larger frame for a female and my cup size is about a B-C size. I'd say that if you're any bigger then these measurements it's probably a good idea to not purchase this item as I picked the XXL which is the largest size available and it's still rather snug. The jacket fits very nicely other then the arms that are a bit tight but they're far from cutting off circulation and the top clasp doesn't seem to want to hold my breasts in the coat. I can see it struggling to hold the fabric over them and this was also without a bra on. I'd say it will probably look alright though if I just leave the top clasp undone or if I wear this with a sports bra. The coat feels rather heavy and like it'll keep me pretty toasty when the cold months start rolling around. It does have a rather funky smell but I'm banking that it'll wear off or at least wear thin with some use. Also the interior of the jacket is white. I had this coat saved on another web site and kept reading that the interior was coming in black on reviews but I did a bit of looking around and it looks like I made the right choice as mine is exactly how it's shown in the picture. In case you were wondering, the material of the interior is the silky, opaque, stuff that's used in wind breakers. It still looks nice but I was hoping for something a bit thicker however I'm just so pleased it came in the color I wanted I barely even care. Over all, I'd say this jacket is very nice as long as you do some homework on it.

reviewText: Watch band great. Very soft Material.

A nice band for the money. Comes with both straight and curved end links. I liked how band are removed: instead of pushing out pins this band is held together with flat L-shaped inserts inside 3 of the links on each side. Inserts can be pushed out with a small screwdriver through windows on the inside of the band. Then they can be pressed back with pliers or a small hammer.
With my thick (about 10mm) watch curved ends look a little smallish. Definitely they are designed with a thinner watch in mind. They fit well, it just how they look.
Clasp locks securely, takes quite a pull to open it. Finish is even, matches nickel-plated watch.
Spring bars not included.
summary: A nice band for the money.

reviewText: Okay. So the Brown Color is a Dark Rich Brown, the Color shown is more of a Tawny/Reddish Brown. *it's weird, if you look at MY photo(s). The Color when it's a Tawny/Reddish Brown, is when taken near Light Bulb Light, the last photo of my 3, where it looks darker was taken in Florescent Light (either way they're an attractive brown). I hope I didn't just make things more confusing. Okay. So I have a sort-of skinny foot, if I had fat chubby feet I'd say they may be too tight at the actually foot part. I also do not have chubby calves, and there is an adequate amount of extra room there as well. They are pretty comfortable, but by hour 8-10 they do start to ache, my feet/legs that is. I own many of these boots in a variety of colors. The first thing I do before I wear them outside is buy a quality suede water-repellent and spray them generously, and even once a month or every other month, especially at the foot part. I live where it's Snowy/Rainy. I've had my oldest pairs for 4.5yrs now and the Suede still looks really good, although mind you I do baby my footwear. *Also I did have to adjust the Belt at the Crown of the Foot and at the Top of the Boot, but like I said, I have skinnier feet/calves. AND... **A HOLE is NOT there to adjust to make them Tighter either, so I had to take them to a Shoe Guy and Have him punch me a new hole, that's really the only draw back.

My advise to spend more and stick to Eagle Creek products, which are worth the difference.

I just got the shirt after a long waiting time but it arrived before the end of the expected date range. This is my first time buying from an overseas place like this one. I am a small person and I usually fit just fine in small and sometimes extra small, so I ordered a small. It still fits fine, it's just a little tight around the bust. The neckline and shoulder straps are pretty much like in the picture (but the shoulder straps are probably a little thicker than shown). reviewText: Not slouchy enough

I was looking for a new hat in local stores because it hadn't dawned on me to check Amazon - and I am a long-time Amazon Prime shopper.  I was only going to order one, but saw the gold and silver offered as one deal and took it.  Actually there were a few more metallic threads than I had expected, but still loved the hats.  I was tired of my old stocking/roll up hats which bunched and were pushed up by my coat collar and I had to keep pulling down over my ears.  These fit great and are comfortable and warm  and the slouchy look looks great.  I walk my dogs every morning at 5:30am and although we live in Memphis, the temps get down in the single digits and teens in the winter (which we never knew when we moved here).  These hats did the trick.  Even though Spring is a couple weeks away, I ordered one more - in case I couldn't find them next year.

Update 3/17/15 - Ordered another hat in taupe and love it as much as the first two.  Same fit and quality.  I'm all set for next winter now.
summary: I Liked Them So Well, I Ordered Another!

This is a very well made shirt. The cotton is sturdy, but not too thick. The design has lasted through almost a year of washing it once a week and, though faded, you can still see what it is. The design seems to be almost dyed into the fabric instead of being a plastic-type graphic that is put on with heat, which means the design has faded, not cracked or fallen off. I really liked this as my daughter wears this shirt at least once a week and it would break her heart if the design had peeled off like some of her other shirts.

reviewText: I ordered the 0-6 months size, and these fit a two-year-old.  The tag says Size 2, so I don't know if I received the wrong size or if they really think these shoes will fit a baby.  The shoes are very cute, although they are quite large.  I will be surprised if they stay on a baby's foot since the top opening is wide and there is no way to make it smaller.  These also took nearly a month to get to my house.

Do not purchase. I am attempting to return mine. I ordered the 0-6 month, the size range is too great to fit a newborn. Twice the size of her foot. Also the sizes on the card don't match the size chart listed even. And I now see the notation that there may be a variance from 1-3 centimeters in the boot, which is rediculous considering a newborns foot is only about 4-5 cm to start with.
Also I don't agree with you get what you pay for, yes they were on sale but there are many other companies that have similarly priced shoes of better quality. Mine arrived with the seams not even being sewn together in places.
If the size were even close and there weren't any holes I would have kept them as the style is cute and may have otherwise worked.
summary: Read description and reviews carefully before you buy these.
